name: Physical Tanks
description:
BLURB
This tanks game is NOT 3D. It’s not ONLINE MULTIPLAYER. But it is a GAME OF YORE!

Relive the days of battling your sibling in this tanks game with 3 maps and amazing power ups(?)!
Plus it's in early access, so even more awesome!

CONTROLS
PLAYER 1
Space - Shoot
Arrow Keys - Move
PLAYER 2
Mouse - Move
LMB - Shoot

POWERUPS
Rapid Fire - Shoot to infinity and beyond!
Invisible - Give your mini tank a invisibilty(?) cloak!
Warp - Use the power of quantum mechanics to become the next night crawler!
Shrink - Fool your opponents (and yourself) by reviving your ant ancestry!

CREDITS
Everything - helewrer3.itch.io or helewrer3.indie.af
